decision_conditions: <p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p>PL-01 â€“ Existing Plans and Site Plan; PL-02 Existing Elevations; PL-03 Proposed Plans; PL04 Proposed Elevations; Fire Safety - Reasonable Exemption Statement; Preliminary Ecological Appraisal and Roost Assessment</p><p>All plans received 18.10.24&nbsp;</p>
The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the local planning authority.
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

<p>Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s) shall be installed in the western side / flank elevations facing 42 Greystoke Avenue and the upper floor eastern side elevation facing 38 Greystoke Avenue of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.</p>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
